name: SnakeSurvival
description:
this game is like a classic snake game but you have to control 2 snake instead. well I don't like the idea of death punishment  so in this game there no death mechanism. you just keep playing till you reach to your goal.

my first game uploaded to itch, hope people like it. there are two modes and a key binding system. really just a learning process for me. if there are enough people like it I might consider to keep it updated. there is a third mode(arcade mode) I was thinking but it is very challenging for me, so I still deciding weather move on to another project or doing that mode. hope you guys will like this game.

default control

wasd for snake1 control and arrow keys for snake2 control(custom key binding only supports keyboard)
